sourcesContent:
import { Button } from "@chakra-ui/button";
import { useDisclosure } from "@chakra-ui/hooks";
import { Box, Flex, Text } from "@chakra-ui/layout";
import { Collapse } from "@chakra-ui/transition";
import { faqItems } from "../../utils/faq";

import ArrowDown from "../../images/idioma.png";
import { Image } from "@chakra-ui/image";

export default function Faq() {
  return (
    <Flex
      flexDirection="column"
      maxW="420px"
      width="100%"
      background="#fff"
      zIndex="9999"
      position="fixed"
      bottom="350px"
      right="100px"
      alignItems="center"
      borderRadius="15px"
      boxShadow="0px 1px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.19)"
      maxHeight="563px"
      overflowY="hidden"
      p="20px 0"
    >
      <Text fontWeight="900" color="#C8C8C8">
        NÃO TENHA DÚVIDAS
      </Text>
      <Text fontWeight="bold" mb="35px" fontSize="18px">
        Perguntas Frequentes
      </Text>
      <Flex overflowY="scroll" flexDir="column" alignItems="center" w="100%">
        {faqItems.map((item) => (
          <CollapseItem content={item.content} title={item.title} />
        ))}
      </Flex>
    </Flex>
  );
}

interface ICollapseProps {
  title: string;
  content: string;
}

function CollapseItem({ content, title }: ICollapseProps) {
  const { isOpen, onToggle } = useDisclosure();

  return (
    <Box
      maxW="350px"
      w="100%"
      p="10px 15px"
      mb="30px"
      border="1px solid #dfdfdf"
      borderRadius="10px"
    >
      <Box>
        <Flex
          cursor="pointer"
          onClick={onToggle}
          alignItems="center"
          w="100%"
          justifyContent="space-between"
        >
          <Text color="#717171" fontSize="14px" fontWeight="900">
            {title}
          </Text>
          <Button
            display="flex"
            alignItems="center"
            justifyContent="center"
            w="14px"
            outline="0"
            variant="unstyled"
          >
            <Image src={ArrowDown}></Image>
          </Button>
        </Flex>

        <Collapse in={isOpen} animateOpacity>
          <Box
            color="#717171"
            fontSize="14px"
            fontWeight="400"
            transition="all 500ms"
            p="10px 0"
            mr="15px"
          >
            {content}
          </Box>
        </Collapse>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
}
